title: Sefertepe artifacts reveal ancient craftsmanship
description: Materials unearthed at Sefertepe as part of the ongoing Taş Tepeler (Stone Hills) Project in the southeastern province of Şanlıurfa are shedding light on the remarkable craftsmanship of communities who lived some 10,500 years ago, particularly in the making of decorative objects.

title: India’s Culinary Heritage That Deserves UNESCO Recognition Next: Biryani, Bebinca, Skyu, Xaak Culture And Ancient Art Of Dastarkhwan
description: India’s kitchens hold living heritage—recipes shaped by royalty, climate, migration, and community. From Hyderabadi biryani’s regal roots and Lucknow’s elegant dastarkhwan to Kashmiri wazwan’s ceremonial craft, Goan bebinca’s patience, Ladakhi skyu’s warmth, Chettinad spice mastery, and Assam’s seasonal xaak, these culinary traditions deserve UNESCO attention. More than food, they’re identity, history, memory, and culture served on a plate.

title: Final day of Bangalore Literature Festival a treat for lovers of contemporary and ancient history alike
description: One of the panel discussions during the Bangalore Literature Festival was led by former diplomat and West Bengal Governor -- Gopal Krishna Gandhi, the grandson of Mahatma Gandhi and C Rajagopalachari, who shared his experience of interacting with Nelson Mandela.

title: UNESCO Adds Jordan's Ancient Mharras Olive Tree To World Heritage List
description: (MENAFN - Jordan News Agency)Amman, Dec. 10 (Petra) -- UNESCO has officially added Jordan's historic "Mharras" olive tree to the Representative List of the Intangible Cultural Heritage of ...

title: AUDIO: Fossil trade threatens scientific endeavour - Australian Broadcasting Corporation
description: AUDIO: Fossil trade threatens scientific endeavour Australian Broadcasting CorporationDinosaur 'like nothing seen before' for sale and some scientists are angry Australian Broadcasting CorporationA dinosaur skeleton is going to auction, but should it be?
